name: 音訊視覺化工具 Pro
description: Transform your audio into captivating visual art with Audio Visualizer Pro, a powerful Chrome extension created in collaboration with Sonic Pulse. Simply upload your favorite music track, and watch it come to life with a dozen stunning, real-time visualization styles. Tailor your creation to perfection with an extensive set of tools: add custom text with unique fonts and eye-catching effects like neon glow and glitch, select from a wide array of color palettes, and even set your own custom background image. When you're ready, record your masterpiece and download it as a high-quality video file, ready to share with the world. Unlock premium features to export in glorious 4K, access exclusive color themes, and gain full control over the branding watermark.
